item.title: Why should you care?
item.description: The story of junk mails Traditionally, businesses have been collecting mailing addresses from their customers as a way to communicate or to promote their products / services. In certain countries such as US, however, businesses sell or share your mailing addresses to other businesses so you suddenly become a target audience for some random company that you might have not even heard of before. The tactic that businesses use is essentially throw garbage at everyone and hope that someone finds interest in them.
